Can she chose one specific "samurai"?
That would make it much easier!
Japan=
ese history is full of warriors who made it big, only to finish  
in disgra=
ce.
If they have it in your library, Ivan Morris' book "The Nobility of  
F=
ailure" could be a very handy text for this kind of presentation.
There are=
 many short biographies, and with your help she should be ok.
